messages.msgSnippet: Yup, I know! The quote here at the bottom (which began with If you tell me your character s name... )  was about letting *Jill* know who he is if he plays on
messages.messageBody:
Yup, I know!

The quote here at the bottom (which began with "If you tell me your
character's name...") was about letting *Jill* know who he is if he
plays on Venture Co.
If Jill's not reading here right now, that will be helpful for him
when he plays.

Robin B.

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: wow realms
messages.msgSnippet: ... Patrick Morris created it after one of the Live and Learn conferences a few years ago.  It s passed through a few guild masters, Patrick, Adli, DJ, Dave,
messages.messageBody:
On Apr 25, 2009, at 12:38 AM, Robin Bentley wrote:

> Jill Parmer and her family play on the Horde of Unschoolers (think she
> created it, maybe). She's always really helpful to new players.

Patrick Morris created it after one of the Live and Learn conferences
a few years ago. It's passed through a few guild masters, Patrick,
Adli, DJ, Dave, me, John, and many of us and lots of new players are
still here and playing.

I'm on Takulah right now, if anyone catches this in time and wants an
invite to the guild.

~Jill

P.S. Sometimes I raise my fist to the air and cuss at Patrick for
creating this on an RP-PvP server! (When I get ganked by the
opposing faction.) And other times I send a thank you out to him,
because it's opened some doors for us to be quick on our fingers :-)
and we've had some fun opportunities for some serious role-playing.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: wow realms

Schuyler

From: Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, 25 April, 2009 3:41:04 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: wow realms

~~I was wanting to know what servers/realms people are on~~

There is actually an unschooling guild called "Horde of Unschoolers" that (as far as I know) is active. Can't remember the server as none of my kids ever joined, but someone will be along shortly to let you know.

Ren
radicalunschooling.blogspot.com

--- On Fri, 4/24/09, Robin Bentley <robin.bentley@...> wrote:


From: Robin Bentley <robin.bentley@...>
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: wow realms
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, April 24, 2009, 11:38 PM









On Apr 24, 2009, at 7:41 PM, Ren Allen wrote:

> ~~I was wanting to know what servers/realms people are on~~
>
> There is actually an unschooling guild called "Horde of Unschoolers"
> that (as far as I know) is active. Can't remember the server as none
> of my kids ever joined, but someone will be along shortly to let you
> know.
>
The server is Venture Co. My daughter, 14, has the following
characters:

Realm: Venture Co.
Guild: Horde of Unschoolers
Character: Varadoria, lvl 45 Blood Elf Huntress
Character: Faedris, lvl 30 Blood Elf Priestess

Realm: Windrunner
Guild: Disciples of Deathwing
Character: Sandfur, lvl 80 Troll Huntress
Character: Starfrost, lvl 73 Tauren Druid

Realm: Windrunner
Guild: Crimson Knights
Character: Wolfwhisper, lvl 74 Night Elf Huntress

and countless other lower level characters, none of which she can
remember at the moment <g>.

Jill Parmer and her family play on the Horde of Unschoolers (think she
created it, maybe). She's always really helpful to new players. Here's
a blurb from Jill wrote on another list:

"If you tell me your character's name, I can keep and eye out for
you. Don't be surprised if someone doesn't let you in the guild
right away; we've been having a bit of trouble with guild bank
raiding. You can look for my characters.. . Talukah, Ehne, Takulah.
It helps if you say who you are and that you got the info from which
ever unschooling list."

Have fun,
Robin B.


















[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

characters:

Guild: Horde of Unschoolers
Character: Varadoria, lvl 45 Blood Elf Huntress
Character: Faedris, lvl 30 Blood Elf Priestess

Guild: Disciples of Deathwing
Character: Sandfur, lvl 80 Troll Huntress
Character: Starfrost, lvl 73 Tauren Druid

Realm: Windrunner

Character: Wolfwhisper, lvl 74 Night Elf Huntress

and countless other lower level characters, none of which she can
remember at the moment <g>.

Jill Parmer and her family play on the Horde of Unschoolers (think she
created it, maybe). She's always really helpful to new players. Here's

Have fun,
Robin B.

Caren

messages.subject: wow realms
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I know this was discussed in January but my son just recently switched to the American server for WOW.  He is 16 is looking for unschool/homeschoolers
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I know this was discussed in January but my son just recently switched to the American server for WOW. He is 16 is looking for unschool/homeschoolers to play with. I was wanting to know what servers/realms people are on so I can forward the info to him so he can find them.

Thanks,
Kim
